snippet: Strategists for Jeb Bush believe that Donald J. Trump is drawing support from voters who are unlikely to support Mr. Bush but are essential to Scott Walker.
abstract: Presidential campaign of Jeb Bush has been delighted by surging poll numbers of Donald J Trump because Trump's rise is preventing other Republican contenders from drawing attention of voters; other candidates are beginning to express their frustration with Trump publicly, and Bush campaign in particular is thankful that Trump seems to be undercutting support for Wisconsin Gov Scott Walker.
lead_paragraph: Strategists for Jeb Bush believe that Donald J. Trump is drawing support from voters who are unlikely to support Mr. Bush but are essential to Scott Walker.

headline.main: Jeb Bush’s Camp Sees an Upside to Donald Trump’s Surge in the G.O.P.
headline.print_headline: Bush Campaign Sees Upside to Trump’s Surge in the G.O.P.
